name: decidium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows decidueye to upgrade spirit shackle into sinister arrow raid.
short_effect: Held: Allows Decidueye to upgrade Spirit Shackle into Sinister Arrow Raid.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Decidueye’s Spirit Shackle to a Z-Move.
